grant.grant_agency: German Ministry of Education and Research (BMBF)
Regional and Global Climate Modeling Program (RGCM) of the U.S. Department of Energy's Biological and Environmental Research (BER) program
UK DECC/DEFRA Met Office Hadley Centre Programme

abstract_text.p: The scientific gaps identified in the fifth phase of the Coupled Model Intercomparison Project (CMIP5) that guided the experiment for its next phase, CMIP6, are identified.
